description.narrative: staff costs, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2019, girls, boys and adolescents including those from conflict affected areas access and stay in an equitable, inclusive and quality education system that contributes to a sustainable peace and reconciliation process

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: staff costs

description.narrative: UNICEF Colombia mobilized the Ministry of National Education to include the ‘Protecting the educational trajectories’ strategies in its indicators report, thereby increasing the visibility of issues such as school dropout, complete trajectories and upper secondary education graduation, and promoting actions in these areas. This led to the preparation of national guidelines and an interagency project with the MPTF for Chocó in 2021. Capacities were strengthened in 66 schools and 7 education secretariats for children’s educational continuity in the context of COVID-19. Based on this experience, a blended learning model was designed for 2021. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/01/2021

title.narrative: Number of educational institutions (EI) in municipalities prioritized by UNICEF that implement innovative pedagogical practices to improve learning in children and teenagers at risk of dropout(41971)

baseline.value: Cordoba - 13 EI and 35 branches. Putumayo - 6 EI and 25 branches. Other departments: 0

target.value: 2020:At 64 schools where actions are already underway

title.narrative: Number and percentage of children and teenagers who increase their learning as a result of innovative pedagogical practices(41973)

baseline.value: To be determined. There shall be an impact assessment to determine change or improvement in learning of target children and their relationship with implemented pedagogical practices
